About

Franklin Farahani

I’m a web developer and designer based in Vancouver, BC with a focus on creating beautiful and easy to use user interfaces.

I discovered my passion for web development as soon as I finished building my first website. My love of the web prompted me to attend the Computer Science and New Media and Web Development programs at Simon Fraser University and BCIT, respectively.

I code every day and I have made it my mission to continue to grow and stay up to date with industry standards. At the moment, I’m especially interested in learning about JavaScript frameworks, specifically React + Redux.

Some of the technologies I often use are JavaScript (ES 2016) and jQuery, Sass, PHP, MySQL, Git, and Gulp.
